QuestData.Title: To Take the Abbey
QuestData.Description: The Scarlet Crusade maintains a well-fortified abbey in the lower western tier of Tyr's Hand. The abbey will need to be secured before proceeding any further into the stronghold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Commander Eligor Dawnbringer outside the abbey at Tyr's Hand in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Well met, $n. Can I trust you to assist me in taking this abbey away from these abominations?
